title: "Heavy Metal Riff" - A Guide to Barbarians
itunes:title: "Heavy Metal Riff" - A Guide to Barbarians
description:
That's our secret we are always angry! This week the Three Black Halflings would like to rage! With veins bulging and axes swinging we hack and slash our way through the Barbarian de-redmistifying (see what I did there) this rather rageful class!

If you enjoy this podcast please help us out by leaving a review and sharing it with your fellow adventurers.

Support us on Patreon at patreon.com/tbhalflings for your Shirefolk Shoutout and Bonus Episodes.

Connect with us on Twitter, Instagram, and Facebook @tbhalflings, on our Discord, or email secondbreakfast@tbhalflings.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
